name: Escaping the blue carpet
description:
🎲 How to play: Controls

WASD / Arrows = Move

Goal

Roll the dice and try to reach the button with the right side face up! Also, try to collect the lost sides spread along the levels for a more challenging experience :D

🔷The blue carpet

Escaping the blue carpet is a puzzle game in a dreaming atmosphere where you need to roll a dice and collect their lost sides spread along the levels.

Escaping the blue carpet was made and dreamed for the GMTK 2022! 

We hope you enjoy  🎲💙

🫂 The creative crew:

game and level design by melotti 

code by andbto

art direction and tech artist by raychof 

2D art by roguepug

3D art by blaack

music and sound by gabi
